fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm protected charge points remain after bulk delete
fields.request_details:
1. Sign into the Django admin and open OCPP â†’ Charge Points.
2. Create a test charge point with a reservation (or use an existing unit with protected firmware/reservation data) and a second disposable charger.
3. Select both records and run the 'Delete selected charge points' action.
4. Confirm the admin shows the error banner explaining protected data must be purged (
) and that the protected charge point is still listed while the disposable charger is removed.
